root.name: Spaceforce: Rogue Universe
root.description: OverviewSpace simulation game.System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor 2.0 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent/ faster processor,Memory: 768 MB of RAM,Hard Disk Space: 3 GB availableVideo Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, Radeon 9500, GeForce 5800 , or greaterSound: 16-bit sound cardDirectX®: DirectX 9.0cRecommendedOS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 2.6 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent/fasterMemory: 1 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 3 GB availableVideo Card: DirectX 9 compatible video card (Radeon x800, GeForce 6800), or greaterSound: 3D compatible sound cardDirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
